aves.dpt.intf.ctrl

Interface AvesManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvesManagerImpl

    public interface AvesManager
    This interface controls the principal functionalities of the Aves application. Classes that implement this interface keep track of the current AvesManager.Phase of the JOURNEYS in order to manage the production of DOCUMENTS (AvesObject) in the Factory and to organize the sequence in which the AvesViewer shows DOCUMENTS.
    Author:
    svlieffe 2012/03/29

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AvesManager.Phase
      Different phases

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void makeObjectsInFactory(AvesManager.Phase currentPhase)
      Requests instances of wrapper classes that define objects to be displayed in the presentation.
      void requestDisplayObjectsInViewer(AvesManager.Phase phase, java.util.List<? extends AvesObject> avesObjectList)
      Requests the AvesViewer to open a content-specific viewer and to display the object.
      java.util.List<? extends AvesObject> requestObjectsFromFactory()
      Requests the objects from Factory.
      void requestShow(AvesManager.Phase currentPhase)
      Consecutively calls AvesManager methods: makeObjectsInFactory(AvesManager.Phase), requestObjectsFromFactory() which returns a List of AvesObject objects that is passed as an argument to displayObjectsInViewer(AvesManager.Phase, List).
      void setPhase(AvesManager.Phase phase)
      Sets the current AvesManager.Phase

        Sets the current AvesManager.Phase
        Parameters:

      • requestShow

        void requestShow(AvesManager.Phase currentPhase)
        Consecutively calls AvesManager methods: makeObjectsInFactory(AvesManager.Phase), requestObjectsFromFactory() which returns a List of AvesObject objects that is passed as an argument to displayObjectsInViewer(AvesManager.Phase, List).
        Parameters:
        currentPhase -

      • makeObjectsInFactory

        void makeObjectsInFactory(AvesManager.Phase currentPhase)
        Requests instances of wrapper classes that define objects to be displayed in the presentation. Factory maintains a list of these instances. The list maintained depends on the current operation phase that defines different modes of operation.
        Parameters:
        currentPhase -

      • requestObjectsFromFactory

        java.util.List<? extends AvesObject> requestObjectsFromFactory()
        Requests the objects from Factory. The objects can then be displayed in the DataViewer.
        Returns:
        AvesObjectList

      • requestDisplayObjectsInViewer

        void requestDisplayObjectsInViewer(AvesManager.Phase phase,
                                   java.util.List<? extends AvesObject> avesObjectList)
        Requests the AvesViewer to open a content-specific viewer and to display the object. The current AvesManager.Phase needs to be passed to this method as well as the objects implementing the AvesObject that will be displayed.
        Parameters:
        phase -
        avesObjectList -
